name: 艺术咖啡机魔法创作
description: 将经典艺术作品或自定义图片通过神奇咖啡机转化为杯中的流体艺术
promptTemplate: A hand wearing a black glove inserts a card printed with {artwork} into a silver, metallic machine. The brand name "veo3video.me" is printed on the front of the machine. After the card is fully inserted, the camera pans down. The outlet of the machine is directly aligned with a {cup_style} cup. Then, a stream of liquid in a mix of colors such as coffee, blue, and yellow flows out of the nozzle, as if multiple pigments are being squeezed out simultaneously. Once the liquid is poured into the cup, it quickly forms a rotating vortex at the bottom. The various colors dynamically interweave and blend with the vortex, yet maintain relatively distinct color zones. As more liquid is poured, these colors eventually perfectly replicate the artwork, like a magical piece of artistic latte art. ASMR sound effects.

artwork.label: 艺术作品
artwork.default: Van Gogh's famous painting The Starry Night

options.value: Van Gogh's famous painting The Starry Night
options.label: 梵高《星夜》
葛饰北斋《神奈川冲浪里》

options.value: Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring
options.label: 维米尔《戴珍珠耳环的少女》
波提切利《维纳斯的诞生》

custom_artwork.placeholder: 选择'上传自定义图片'后，在此上传您的图片
